backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with file, folder, note, mission, upload tracking, and authorization logic, initializing various maps and counters for application state.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration types and a no-op run function that returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing the creation and validation of a Draft baseline synced 1:1 with Live version 114.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Explains a post-restore change freeze policy requiring explicit user approval before modifying the baseline.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, and capabilities.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and update handling.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Provides a checklist and troubleshooting guide for verifying PWA installability on Chrome for Android.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist documenting verification steps to restore the frontend to the exact Live v114 state.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app wiring providers, intro logic, homepage rendering, and upload queue runner.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing actor initialization errors with retry, sign‑out, and technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed bottom horizontal line used as a decorative UI element.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when the browser blocks external file opening.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog that previews files by type, provides actions like open, download, move, and delete, and manages related confirmations.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads including Web Worker processing, speech-to-text input, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens folders view, showing a folder icon and label.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Fullscreen folder manager enabling creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Provides a full-screen viewer for files with swipe navigation, download, delete, share, and folder/mission actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, previews, and bulk actions, and opens items in viewers.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, title, and a unified progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a timed splash intro animation that fades out and signals completion.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Modal shown when external links fail to open, allowing retry or copy to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button to sign in via Internet Identity with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission view for editing title, tasks, and viewing attached files/notes with autosave.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task list management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Renders a floating missions button with hover animations and optional disabled/overlay states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Provides a full‑screen missions list with swipe navigation, mission CRUD actions, and detail/creation views.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wraps children in a mobile‑only container layout.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a mission, showing missions and handling move operations.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Displays a full note view with actions for sending, downloading, sharing, and deleting the note.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving or returning files and notes to folders, with performance diagnostics and batch operations.
Provides swipeable row behavior exposing edit and delete actions with gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Shows an upload progress bar summarizing active uploads and overall progress.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores pending uploads on startup and resumes them with progress tracking and concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Displays the app’s introductory landing screen with an illustrated target icon and login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages creation and lifecycle of the backend actor with retry logic, error mapping, and identity handling.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides upload state management, batching, and progress updates with throttled rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, reinitializing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches core home-screen data once the backend actor is ready to speed up initial loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Runs a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after identity initialization and authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer such as touch, updating on input changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced mission autosave with mutation queuing, mission-change resets, and change detection against hydrated state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with actor readiness checks and targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching notes by folder or mission and creating notes with concurrency limiting and selective cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for file and folder operations, including paginated fetching, creation, and upload-concurrency control.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: React hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition with streaming transcripts, error handling, and lifecycle management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive CSS variable themes for light/dark modes and component color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component managing authentication state, data fetching, lazy-loaded views, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers for classifying actor initialization errors and producing standardized user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing content via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Logic for determining how to open files based on MIME type, including viewer, preview, or download-only rules.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Provides helpers to categorize files by MIME type, determine previewability, and return human-readable file labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, determines completion status, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two Task arrays safely with BigInt IDs by checking length and field equality.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements an optional performance diagnostics tool with timing, logging, and async operation helpers.
Manages a persisted IndexedDB-backed upload queue, allowing enqueueing, progress updates, removal, and retrieval of upload items.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events during development for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only smoke tests for key backend flows and formats results for display.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Creates a concurrency limiter that queues tasks and ensures no more than a set number run simultaneously.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web Worker that reads file bytes off the main thread and returns them or an error response.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom radius, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography and animations.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for drift detection.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, and feature requirements for improving background multi-file uploads, progress accuracy, and speed.
